ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/NVIDIA/TensorRT-LLM
ns0:entry.ns0:content: TensorRT-LLM provides users with an easy-to-use Python API to define Large Language Models (LLMs) and support state-of-the-art optimizations to perform inference efficiently on NVIDIA GPUs. TensorRT-LLM also contains components to create Python and C++ runtimes that orchestrate the inference execution in performant way.
